page.title: 02THE POST OFFICE LANGTOFT
page.content:
The range of service that the post office provides are postage stamps,giro,pensions,family allowance,premium bonds, stamp collecting and other things. It also sells things that are nothing to do with the Post Office like socks and other things.The best thing that Mrs Flatters likes is when old people come and get their pensions on Thursdays. Inside the Post Office there are shelves in the right hand coner and near the counter there is a rack with cards on it.On the left hand side there is a rack with papers and comics on it.Straight in front of you there is a counter with glass in front of it,this is to stop robbers jumping over the counter and getting the money.
by Fay Middleton.
